title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, July 5, 2020
description: The Battle of Osan took place on this date 70 years ago. It was the first face-off of American and North Korean troops in the Korean War.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The Battle of Osan took place on this date 70 years ago. It was the first face-off of American and North Korean troops in the Korean War.
